about_the_game:
Get ready for a far-out adventure that flips the dating sim genre upside down and powerbombs it through a ringside table! It's time to bodyslam a diverse cast of muscle cuties and wrestling weirdos!

The world's cuddliest choice-based life / wrestling / dating simulator is back! Enter the surreal world of 'Wrestling With Emotions' with a game that's bursting with heart, humor and muscle-bound cuties! Create yr dream wrestle-babe and tell a unique story of bent rules, broken hearts and bulging biceps!





The year is 1994. Wrestling is radder than ever. You just landed your dream gig, performing alongside your heroes in “Wrestling With Emotions”! The big boss, Manny McMan, is just looking for another low-level jobber and your coach Major Malfunction doesn't see much potential in you. Guess you'll just have to prove them wrong! Or you could be a total slacker? It's your call!

Befriend, seduce, enrage and bodyslam a diverse cast of adorable muscle cuties to build the friendships and rivalries that will take you from new kid to the next Wrestling With Emotions superstar!





Do you want to be a muscle-bound himbo? Do you dream of being the most elegant warrior in the ring? Do you want to put the attitude back into wrestling? Maybe you just want to blow audiences away with your theatrics? In 'Wrestling With Emotions' you can do it all! There are no wrong choices in this story that celebrates individuality, and rewards every player with their own absurd adventure!

Meaningful choices and role-playing take center stage as you build your dream wrestler! Attract the perfect partner as you pump up your MEAT (Muscle, Elegance, Attitude & Theatrics)! Shape a unique personality by growing your BONES (Bodacious, Open, Nervous Easy Going & Steadfast)! Develop your own wrestling style with your GUTS (Grabby, Uppies, Throws and Strikes). Combine MEAT, BONES & GUTS to create brand-new power moves and finishers!

On your path to becoming a legend, who will stand in your way and who will fight by your side? Only you can find out!





* Craft a one-of-a-kind wrestler with the 'Look Out Lovers' character creator!
* Pump up your M.E.A.T (Muscle, Elegance, Attitude & Theatrics)!
* Develop close partnerships or forge bitter rivalries with a diverse stable of 7 date-able dreamboats!
* Invent unique signature moves to win over your crush!
* Play by your own rules! Choices shape your character and their path through the promotion!
* Enjoy hand-drawn graphics and surreal songs in classic Team Lazerbeam style!
* 12+ hours of playtime in each adventure, unlocking 1 of 16 explosive endings!

fullgame.name: Wrestling With Emotions: New Kid on the Block

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Iris 5100 graphics processor (Mac 2014)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Roughly equivalent to a 2014 Macbook
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Iris 5100 graphics processor (Mac 2014)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Roughly equivalent to a 2018 Macbook

name: Wrestling With Emotions: New Kid On The Block Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz Dual Core
  • Graphics: 1024 Mb
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB

short_description: It’s time to kick ass and break hearts! Wrestling with Emotions: New Kid on the Block Demo gives you a chance to experience our wrestling dating sim that combines elements of RPGs and punk games to create a uniquely anarchic experience.
